Description: * Fixed spectating ending 1 minute before the game ended
* Fixed Hero Demo starting you at max level
* Fixed {{PageRef|Lady Geist}} Lady Geist not being able to jump during {{PageRef|Life Drain}} Life Drain
* Fixed the boon level display in the hero pages not working correctly
* Changed default shop music back to original
* {{PageRef|Shiv}} Shiv: Gun base damage reduced from 6.3 to 5.7
* {{PageRef|Shiv}} Shiv: {{PageRef|Serrated Knives}} Serrated Knives collision size reduced by 10%
* {{PageRef|Shiv}} Shiv: {{PageRef|Serrated Knives}} Serrated Knives projectile speed reduced by 10%
* {{PageRef|Shiv}} Shiv: {{PageRef|Serrated Knives}} Serrated Knives base damage reduced from 75 to 35
* {{PageRef|Shiv}} Shiv: {{PageRef|Serrated Knives}} Serrated Knives spirit scaling reduced from 1 to 0.6
* {{PageRef|Shiv}} Shiv: {{PageRef|Serrated Knives}} Serrated Knives DPS spirit scaling reduced from 0.2 to 0.16
* {{PageRef|Shiv}} Shiv: {{PageRef|Serrated Knives}} Serrated Knives T3 reduced from +75 Damage and +5 Bleed to +40 Damage and +5 Bleed
* {{PageRef|Shiv}} Shiv: Fixed {{PageRef|Serrated Knives}} Serrated Knives bouncing to other units even if it did not impact the target
* {{PageRef|Shiv}} Shiv: Fixed Rage and {{PageRef|Bloodletting}} Bloodletting not clearing out on death
* {{PageRef|Shiv}} Shiv: Fixed {{PageRef|Bloodletting}} Bloodletting deferred damage waking him up from sleep
* {{PageRef|Shiv}} Shiv: Fixed {{PageRef|Killing Blow}} Killing Blow falling through the world sometimes
* {{PageRef|Ivy}} Ivy: Restored previous audio processing
* {{PageRef|Ivy}} Ivy: {{PageRef|Air Drop}} Air Drop cooldown increased from 70s to 80s
* {{PageRef|Ivy}} Ivy: {{PageRef|Air Drop}} Air Drop duration reduced from 20s to 17s
* {{PageRef|Ivy}} Ivy: {{PageRef|Air Drop}} Air Drop bomb no longer silences in the base (now part of t3)
* {{PageRef|Ivy}} Ivy: {{PageRef|Air Drop}} Air Drop bomb slow duration increased from 3s to 4.5s
* {{PageRef|Ivy}} Ivy: {{PageRef|Air Drop}} Air Drop T2 now also has +5m radius
* {{PageRef|Ivy}} Ivy: {{PageRef|Air Drop}} Air Drop T3 no longer has +12m radius
* {{PageRef|Ivy}} Ivy: {{PageRef|Air Drop}} Air Drop T3 no longer extends debuff duration by +2s
* {{PageRef|Ivy}} Ivy: {{PageRef|Air Drop}} Air Drop T3 silences enemies for 4.5s
